where.if: and (cw.keyword like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or cw.name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or cw.p_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')

mapper.insert: insert into KJK_COURSEWARE (ID, NAME, P_NAME, CODE, PATH, FILE_TYPE, PLAY_TYPE, SUBJECT, KEYWORD, INTRODUCE, EXPERT, EXPERT_UNIT, SOURCE, CREATE_DATE, ADD_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CLICK_COUNT, STATUS, CLASS_TIME, CLASS_HOUR, REMARK, PAR1, PAR2, PAR3, PAR4, MOBILE_TYPE, SUBJECT2, SL_IMG, LOGO, PIANTOU, PIANWEI, SHOT_YEAR,CLASS_TIME_STR,LABEL, CREATER,PLAY_FLAG,PROJECT_LEVEL,MODIFIER) values (KJK_COURSEWARE_SEQ.nextval, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{playType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expertUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{clickCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{classTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{classHour,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{par1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{par2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{par3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{par4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subject2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{slImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{piantou,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pianwei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shotYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{classTimeStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{playFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{projectLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update KJK_COURSEWARE set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_NAME = #{pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATH = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_TYPE = #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLAY_TYPE = #{playType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJECT = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEYWORD = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTRODUCE = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPERT = #{expert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPERT_UNIT = #{expertUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOURCE = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ADD_DATE = #{addDate,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CLICK_COUNT = #{clickCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLASS_TIME = #{classTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLASS_HOUR = #{classHour,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAR1 = #{par1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAR2 = #{par2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAR3 = #{par3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAR4 = #{par4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE_TYPE = #{mobileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJECT2 = #{subject2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SL_IMG = #{slImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGO = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIANTOU = #{piantou,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIANWEI = #{pianwei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOT_YEAR = #{shotYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLASS_TIME_STR = #{classTimeStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LABEl=#{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATER=#{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLAY_FLAG=#{playFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_LEVEL=#{projectLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER=#{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
